dct_title_s: The East Indies : with the roads (Sheet 2)
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:2,600,000]. Shows boundaries, rivers, roads and settlements. Relief shown pictorially. Longitude given from both Ferro and London meridians.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_publisher_sm: Published according to Act of Parliament ... by Rob. Sayer ... ; London

South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
